text: Rocky IV is a 1985 American sports drama movie directed by Sylvester Stallone (who also stars) and starring Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers, Brigitte Nielsen, Dolph Lundgren, Tony Burton, Michael Pataki. It is the sequel to the 1982 movie Rocky III and is the fourth movie in the Rocky franchise. The movie was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and United Artists. It won 5 Razzie Awards and was nominated for 4 Razzie Awards in 1986. The movie started the Hollywood career of Dolph Lundgren, who played the Soviet boxer Ivan Drago. == Other websites == * * * * * * * Category:1985 drama movies Category:1980s sports movies Category:1980s sequel movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Rocky movies Category:Cold War movies Category:Movies set in Philadelphia Category:Movies set in Las Vegas Category:Movies set in Moscow Category:Movies set in Russia Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Sylvester Stallone
title: Rocky IV
